mapper.select: SELECT deal_id, user_id, sum(money) as totalMoney FROM `open_countly`.`ct_order` ${ew.customSqlSegment} GROUP BY deal_id, user_id
select ${groupBy} as id, count(user_id) as count_user, sum(money) as sum_money from ct_order a left join open_gateway.op_deal b on a.deal_id = b.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
select ${groupBy} as id, count(unique_id) as count_device, sum(money) as sum_money from ct_order a left join open_gateway.op_deal b on a.deal_id = b.id ${ew.customSqlSegment}
SELECT a.money, count( * ) AS count FROM ct_order a LEFT JOIN open_gateway.op_deal b ON ( b.id = a.deal_id ) LEFT JOIN open_gateway.op_pkg c ON ( a.pkg_id = c.id ) ${ew.customSqlSegment}

SELECT a.user_create_time as day, count( * ) AS count FROM ct_order a LEFT JOIN open_gateway.op_deal b ON ( b.id = a.deal_id ) LEFT JOIN open_gateway.op_pkg c ON ( a.pkg_id = c.id ) ${ew.customSqlSegment}
